name: Trigger konran Prototype
description:
Q - Shoot Pistol

W - Shoot AK burst

E - Shoot Sniper

R (Hold) - Shoot Gatling Gun

Shoot down the zombies before they reach you, the more centered the aim lines are, the more damage the bullets will do, keep a good rhythm to maximize damage over time.

While using the pistol the more centered the aim lines are when you shoot, the more centered will they be when they reappear.

Unlike the pistol and the sniper, the AK can be kept steady, but will lose aim due to recoil if you use it repeatedly.

Strong sniper bullets can pierce enemies.

The gatling gun can easily kill an enemy, but takes time to start shooting due to it's rotation, don't get careless.
